title: Is this the second coming of The Beatles?
body:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vskdpqhvfK0/Vccx7HBFWfI/AAAAAAAAFmo/mLheF3ciAFY/s1600/Wonder-Girl---Candle.jpg

There's a hot new reggae joint by this hot new band you should check out. These ladies are truly amazing. They write all their own songs, play all their own instruments, they sing like angels, and they're beautiful. Many people are comparing them to the Beatles due to their talent.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYGODWJgR-c
